name: Rehabilitation Sciences Veda
description: Located inside the Rehabilitation Sciences builing at 500 University Avenue, Veda offers Indian takeout. Catering available 416-961-9797. Menu includes hot meals and snacks like curries, sandwiches, pizzas & samosas. Halal & Vegan options available.

name: Athletic Centre Starbucks
description: Starbucks location with seating. Serving Starbucks snacks, beverages and merchandise. Located on the lower level of the Athletic Centre.

name: Brennan's Best Coffee Lounge
description: Snack cart serving coffee and snacks.
address: 81 St. Mary Street, Toronto, ON M5S 1J4

name: Café Reznikoff
description: Café Reznikoff is located in Morrison Hall. Entrance is off St. George Street, into Morrisson Hall.  Seating is available. Menu includes sandwiches, baked goods, beverages and snacks. Fair trade coffee is sold here.

name: Canada Room
description:
Canada Room offers made to order hot and cold entrees, Chef menus, fresh salad bars and My Pantry, which allows you to create your own meals.
Summer hours:
Breakfast 7:30am - 9:30am
Lunch 11:30am - 1:30pm
Dinner 5:00pm - 7:00pm
address: 81 St. Mary Street, Toronto, ON M5S 1J4

name: Chestnut Tree
description:
This all-you-care-to-eat facility offers 15 food stations serving diverse and ethnic food daily! Dine on fresh, local and sustainable certified food, and explore flavors from around the world!
Breakfast: 7 -10.30 am
Lunch: CLOSED
Dinner: 5.30 -8 pm

name: Grad Room Second Cup
description: Coffee, baked goods, and snacks are available at this location. Comfortable and tables offer a great view of Spadina. Wifi available.

name: Hard Hat Cafe
description: Located in the basement of Sandford Fleming, this cafe is owned and operated by the Engineering Society. Offerings include coffee, baked goods, pizza, frozen entrees, beverages and snacks.
address: 10 King's College Rd, Toronto, ON M5S 3G4

name: Howard Ferguson Dining Hall
description:
This contemporary cafeteria-style servery serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Selections include a variety of beverages, snacks, and entrees prepared to your liking.
Clsed for the summer.
address: 75 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 2E5

name: Innis Cafe
description: Innis Cafe is a family-run operation. It is located in the west wing of Innis College. Seating is available.

name: Kelly Cafe
description: The Kelly Cafe is a bright, vibrant hub of social and academic activity for the St. Mike's community. The Kelly Cafe offers a selection of hot and cold beverages.
address: 113 St. Joseph Street, Toronto, ON M5S 3C2

name: Koffler Second Cup
description: Located in the atrium of Koffler Centre, this newly renovated location offers coffee and espresso based beverages, snacks, baked goods, sandwiches and catering.

name: Law Cafe
description: Starbucks, pre-made sandwiches & salads, confectionary, cold beverages, and baked goods.

name: McLennan P.O.D. Express
description: This coffee kiosk is located on the main level in the lobby. You can purchase pre-made sandwiches & salads, confectionary, Starbucks coffee, cold beverages, and baked goods.

name: Medical Sciences Building Cafeteria
description:
This full cafeteria includes Starbucks, Pizza Pizza, Spring Rolls, Euro Baguette, pasta station, grilled entrees, and a custom salad bar. 
Note: Spring Rolls hours:
Monday-Thursday: 11 am-3:30 pm
Friday: 11 am-3 pm
Saturday & Sunday: CLOSED.
address: 1 King's College Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 1A8

name: Medical Sciences Building Starbucks
description: Starbucks location with seating. Serving Starbucks snacks, beverages and merchandise. Located next to the cafeteria on the main floor inside Medical Sciences Building.

name: Medical Sciences Building Tim Hortons
description: Located in the North end of MSB, this coffee kiosk serves donuts, baked goods, coffee and tea.
address: 1 King's College Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 1A8

name: The Cube
description: Formerly known as Megabites, this newly renovated gem is located at the south-west end of BCIT. This cafe serves Starbucks coffee, sandwiches, Grab and Go, salads, confectionary, cold beverages, baked goods, and soup.
address: 40 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 2E4

name: Veda Healthy Indian Takeout - Multi-Faith Centre
description: Located on the ground floor of the Koffler House, Multi-Faith Centre at the corner of Spadina Crescent and Bancroft Ave. Catering available (416-961-9797). Menu includes hot meals and snacks like curries &*samosas. Halal & Vegan options available.

name: New College Dining Hall
description: This all-you-care-to-eat dining hall serves a variety of fresh meals daily! With 12 stations to choose from, you can enjoy multiple servings of your favorite dish and experience new cuisines. (Breakfast:7.30-10.30; Lunch:10.30-3.00; Dinner:3.00-9.30)

name: OISE Cafe
description:
This coffee kiosk is located on the main level, in the lobby of OISE. Offerings include Starbucks coffee, Pizza Pizza, pre-made sandwiches & salads, confectionary, cold beverages, and baked goods. 

*12th Floor Nexus Lounge is closed.
address: 252 Bloor St. West, Toronto, ON M5S 1V6

name: Pharmacy Second Cup
description: Located on the main level in the lobby of the Pharmacy Building, this coffee kiosk serves espresso based drinks, smoothies, baked goods, sandwiches, cookies, muffins, and snacks.

name: Robarts Cafeteria
description: Located on the second floor of Robarts Library across from the T-Card office, this full cafeteria includes Subway, Pizza Pizza, Chicken Chicken, Euro Market, Express, Expressos, Benne Pasta and Bento Nouveau Sushi.
address: 130 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 1A5

name: Robarts Subway
description: Located in Robarts Cafeteria, this Subway location serves various submarine sandwiches, salads and snacks.
address: 130 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 1A5

name: Robarts Starbucks
description: Located in Robarts Cafeteria, this coffee kiosk serves Starbucks coffee and beverages, snacks, baked goods, and merchandise.
address: 130 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 1A5

name: Rotman Second Cup
description: Located on the main level, in the lobby of Rotman School, this coffee kiosk serves hot and cold beverages, snacks, cookies, muffins, sandwiches, and baked goods.
address: 105 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 3E6

name: Sammys Student Exchange
description: Sammy's is a multicultural pub and cafe inside Hart House. They serve healthy breakfast, lunch and dinner catered for a variety of diets. Sammy's also features music, a full bar, large screen tv and outdoor patio.
address: 7 Hart House Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 3H3

name: Veda Healthy Indian Takeout - Sandford Fleming
description: Located in basement of Sandford Fleming in the Engineering building. Catering available 416-961-9797. Menu includes hot meals and snacks like curries, sandwiches, pizzas & samosas. Halal & Vegan options available
address: 10 King's College Road, Toronto, ON M5S 3G4

name: Sids Cafe
description: Located on the lower level of Sidney Smith at the south end of the building. Offerings include Spring Rolls Go, Pizza Pizza, Rotissary Chicken at Bon Fire, Grill Works, Sultan’s, Grab and Go Express Cooler, Salad Garden, Bento Nouveau.
address: 100 St George St, Toronto, ON M5S 3G3

name: Sid Smith Tim Hortons
description: Located inside Sid's Cafe, this coffee kiosk serves donuts, baked goods, coffee, smoothies and breakfast options.
address: 100 St George St, Toronto, ON M5S 3G3

name: Sid Smith Second Cup
description: Located in the lobby of Sidney Smith Hall on the main level, this coffee kiosk serves hot and iced beverages, sandwiches, muffins, juices, cookies, baked goods and snacks. Catering is also available.
address: 100 St George St, Toronto, ON M5S 3G3

name: The Buttery
description: A la carte cafeteria offering a variety of hot meals and grab and go options. Menu includes Pizza Pizza; Design your own sandwich deli; Grab and Go Sandwiches; Salads; Yogurt Parfaits; Soups; Freshly baked goods; Starbucks Coffee; Fruit; & Snacks.

name: The Green Beet
description: Cafe with seating located in the basement of Gerstein Library. The Green Beet is a vegetarian’s paradise, vegans welcome too! We’ve got accommodations for both dietary profiles.
address: 9 King's College Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 1A8

name: Woodsworth Second Cup
description: Located in the lobby of Woodsworth College, this coffee kiosk serves hot and iced beverages, coffee, sandwiches, cookies, muffins, snacks and baked goods. Catering is also available.
address: 119 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 2E9

name: Ned's Cafe
description:
Features a cozy gas fireplace and outdoor terrace. A variety of nutritious grab and go meals are also available.
Custom made sandwiches, wraps, salads, sushi, Indian cuisine and soup of the day. Students can spend their VicDollars or cash.
address: 95 Charles St. W, Toronto, ON M5S 1K5

name: Caffiends
description: Caffiends is a not-for-profit, student-volunteer run, eco-friendly cafe. It's known all over campus for its $1 fair-trade coffee, delicious and nutritious snacks (nut and gluten free options available) and its comfy study zone. Room 111.
address: 91 Charles St. W, Toronto, ON M5S 1K5

name: Coffee Shed by Common Ground Co-Op
description: The Coffee Shed is a partnership of people with intellectual disabilities who are using talents they have developed to create employment for themselves. We sell delicious baked goods and sandwiches made by Lemon & Allspice, as well as coffee.

name: Diabolos Coffee Bar
description:
Student-run eatery in the Junior Common Room (JCR) of UC. Accepts UC Flex Dollars. Menu offers vegan-friendly, fair trade, environmentally conscious coffee and snacks.
Closed on Weekends, Holidays, Summer and on days when university is closed.
address: 15 King's College Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 3H7

name: Gallery Grill
description: Fine dining restaurant and bar located on the second floor of Hart House.
address: 7 Hart House Circle, Toronto, ON M5S 3H3

name: GSU Pub
description: Located on the first floor of the GSU building. Pool tables and a big screen t.v.

name: Hot Yam
description: The Hot Yam! is a volunteer group of food lovers dedicated to offering great and affordable vegan, mostly organic and local lunches to the U of T masses.
address: 33 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 1A4

name: Wolfond Centre for Jewish Campus Life
description:
Harvey's Table at the Wolfond Centre offers fresh, kosher meals.
Lunch by request only.

name: Burwash Dining Hall
description:
The main dining hall at Vic, Burwash has an all-you-care-to-eat 5 week menu that is always rotating.
Burwash and Ned’s cafe do not accept UeaT meal plans or flex dollars. 
Mon-Fri: 7:30-3:00 and 4:00-7:30
Sat-Sun: 10:00-3:00 and 4:00-7:00

name: Harvest Noon Cafe
description: Located on the 2nd floor of the Graduate Students’ Union at 16 Bancroft Ave., the cafe offers vegetarian & vegan options in a relaxed and inclusive space. Open for special programming, workshops, and select meals. Check website: harvestnoon.com

name: The Exchange
description: The Exchange in the Rotman School specializes in food that is inventive, healthy, local, and affordable. Menu includes grab n go, hot meals, all day breakfast, soups, salads, casseroles & their popularJalapeño Mac ‘N’ Cheese.

name: Bladen Wing Tim Horton's
description:
Located on the second floor of the Bladen Wing, this is a full-service Tim Horton's. Coffee, tea, fruit smoothies, sandwiches, wraps, muffins, donuts available.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Starbucks
description:
Located within the Meeting Place on the second floor of the Science Wing, serving coffee, tea, breakfast and baked goods.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Beechgrove Cafe
description:
This cafe on the ground level features the coffee line from Seattle's Best Coffee as well as quick grab and go snack items, sandwiches, cold beverages and Pizza Pizza slices.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Blind Duck Pub
description: The on-campus pub is located in the heart of UTM and is operated by your very own student union. Escape to the Blind Duck Pub where they cook up delicious pub favourites, comfort foods, and cold beverages.  Or, try one of the specials offered daily!
address: UTM Student Centre, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Temporary Food Court
description:
The Temporary Food Court is host to several quality dining options including:
*Booster Juice
*Elements
*International Kitchen
*Pizza Pizza
*Quick Cuisine
*Tandoori Indian Cuisine
*Tim Hortons Express
*Deli (Opening 2014)
*Hours subject to change
address: Davis Building, 3359 Mississauga Rd. Mississauga Ontario

name: Subway
description: Subway has whatever you’re in the mood for. With over 30 menu items to choose from, Subway serves sandwiches, wraps, salads and sides.  All are made fresh to order, exactly the way you want it!
address: Davis Building Meeting Place, 3359 Mississauga Rd. Mississauga Ontario

name: Second Cup
description: Second Cup offers a variety of warm and cold beverages and tasty treats and desserts.  Brewed coffee is now self-serve.  Also serving Steamplicity take-out rethermalizable entrees along with soup and other On the Go meal and snack options.
address: Kaneff Centre, Innovation Complex, 3359 Mississauga Rd. Mississauga Ontario

name: Tim Hortons
description: Tim Hortons offers its own special blend coffee, traditional doughnuts and other baked goods, breakfast, soups & chili, as well as an excellent selection of sandwiches and wraps.
address: Davis Building Meeting Place, 3359 Mississauga Rd. Mississauga Ontario

name: Circuit Break Cafe
description: Located on the ground floor of the CCT. This café serves Fair Trade coffee, cold beverages, hot and ready pizza, homemade soup, grab & go options, freshly baked gourmet cookies and other savory snacks. Microwave and vending machines are nearby.
address: Ground Floor, CCT, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Starbucks
description: Starbucks coffeehouse offers handcrafted warm and cold beverages from around the world for you to discover and enjoy.  You can also select from a variety of delicious baked goods, pastries, light snacks, and light lunches that are offered daily.
address: Hazel McCallion Academic Learning Centre, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Missisauga, Ontario

name: Second Cup
description: Second Cup offers a variety of warm and cold beverages and tasty treats.  From fresh brewed coffee, tea, cappuccino, and lattes to frozen favourites such as the chiller, fruit chiller, and coffee over ice, all in variety of flavours.
address: Instructional Centre, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Panini Fresca
description: Assorted meats and toppings are combined on freshly baked breads and then grilled and warmed on the panini press to recreate the signature Italian ‘paninio’ sandwich. Located right by the Instructional Centre café and lounge!
address: Instructional Centre, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Deerfield Hall Vending
description:
Pepsi machine with TCard readers - 1st floor
Snack machine - 2nd floor
Coke machine - 2nd floor
address: Deerfield Hall, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: North Side Bistro
description: Offers scratch soups, rustic pizzas and calzones repared daily in a Wood Stone oven, hearty entree salads, freshly baked goods, daily roasted Baden coffee, and Sloane teas.  Vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options available!
address: North Building, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: On the Go
description: Offers freshly prepared & pre-packaged meals, snacks, and beverages so you can take your food 'On the Go!' Select from a variety of sandwiches, wraps, sushi, and salad or enjoy healthy snacks such as yogurt, parfait, fruit cups, and pita with humus.
address: Instructional Centre, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Mike's Dog House
description: The ‘Dog House’ offers Mike’s famous gourmet hotdogs, chili & cheese fries, and cold beverages. Choose from the many combinations available on the menu, and from familiar favourites such as the Monster Dog and the Bacon & Cheese Dog!
address: 5 Minute Walk, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Hospitality & Retail Services
description: For all matters regarding Food Services and/or the Student Meal Plans at UTM, please contact the Hospitality & Retail Services Office, directly, in room 3127 of the Davis Building, via email at mealplan.utm@utoronto.ca, or by phone at (905) 569-4795.

name: Chartwells
description: Chartwells is the official food service provider for the University of Toronto Mississauga

name: La Prep
description:
Situated on the ground level of the Instructional Centre, this location serves specialized coffees, teas, hot and cold beverages, sandwiches, salads, soups and assorted baked goods.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Rex's Den Restaurant
description:
Located on the lower level of the Student Centre, this location serves as the student run restaurant on campus and offers both sit down and take out options. Daily specials are available

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Hot Dog Cart
description: Located outdoor courtyard of the Student Centre, the Hot Dog Guy offers chips, poutine, cold beverages along with a variety of hot dogs.

name: Subway
description:
Located on the Ground Level of the Student Centre, this food outlet offers various submarine sandwiches, salads and snacks

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Treats
description:
Situated in the Student Centre food court on the ground level, this location offers a variety of coffees, teas, bubble tea, cold beverages, breakfast and regular sandwiches and baked goods.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Hero Certified Burgers
description:
This outlet is located in the food court of the Student Centre on the Ground Level. It offers 100% seasoned heritage Angus beef raised without hormones or antibiotics, gluten-free and Halal certified.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/uts

name: KFC Express
description:
This express location in the food court of the Student Centre offers quick meal options such as chicken sandwiches, original popcorn chicken, wraps, chicken strips, poutine, fries and ice cold beverages.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/

name: Asian Gourmet
description:
This outlet located in the food court of the Student Centre on the Ground Level offers a variety of Asian food.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: The Market Place
description:
The Market Place is located on the first floor of the Humanities Wing. This cafeteria style area offers a variety of cuisines. An indoor seating area is also available.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Booster Juice
description:
Located inside The Market Place on the first floor of the Humanities Wing, this kiosk offers a variety of freshly made juices.

For hours of operation, visit http://uoft.me/utscfood

name: Student Centre Microwave
description: Microwave station available on the 2nd floor

name: Science Wing Microwave
description: Microwave station available on the 3rd floor of the Science Wing at the top of the Meeting Place stairs

name: Bladen Wing Microwave
description: Microwave station available on the 2nd floor across from the Tim Horton's

name: Social Sciences Microwave
description: Microwave station available on the ground level inside the study area

name: INS
description: This convenience store located on the Ground Level of the Student Centre offers a variety of snacks, coffee, beverages as well as grab and go sandwiches.

name: Bladen Wing Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the second floor of the Bladen Wing and provides snacks, drinks as well as frozen food

name: Humanities Wing Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the second floor of the Humanities Wing and provides snacks, drinks as well as refridgerated food

name: Student Residence Centre Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the ground level of the Student Residence Centre, provides snacks and drinks

name: Science-Psychology Wing Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the ground level between the Science Wing and the Psychology building, provides snacks and drinks

name: Instructional Centre Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the first floor of the Instructional Centre and provides snacks and drinks

name: Science Wing Vending Machines
description: These machines are located on the third level of the Science Wing and vends snacks and drinks

name: Student Centre Vending Machine
description: This vending machine is located on the second floor of the Student Centre and vends drinks

name: Student Centre Vending Machine (L3)
description: This machine is located on the third level of the Student Centre and vends drinks

name: Athletics Centre Vending Machine
description: Located on the lower level of the Athletics Centre, this machine vends beverages

name: Coach House Vending Machine
description: This vending machine is located outside the Coach House and provides drinks
address: 130 Old Kingston Road, Toronto ON M1E 3J5

name: Colman Commons Dining Hall
description: Located in the Oscar Peterson Hall Residence, the diner features breakfast, lunch, & dinner to order. Freshly prepared foods including stir frys, pastas, comfort foods, sandwiches, burgers, salads, and deserts. Assorted beverages are also available.
address: Oscar Peterson Hall, 3359 Mississauga Rd., Mississauga, Ontario

name: Erindale Hall Vending Machines
address: Main Floor, Erindale Hall, 3359 Mississauga Rd.

name: Roy Ivor Hall Vending Machines
address: Main Floor, Roy Ivor Hall, 3359 Mississauga Rd.

name: MaGrath Valley Vending Machines
address: Laundry Room, MaGrath Valley, 3359 Mississauga Rd.

name: Oscar Peterson Hall Vending Machines
address: Main Floor, Oscar Peterson Hall, 3359 Mississauga Rd.

name: Medical Sciences Building Spring Roll Go
description: Looking for some pad thai, or maybe, spring rolls? Come by for one of the most delicious dishes on campus!
